main.name: Paul Wang
main.description: Hi! I'm a software developer that was interested in full-stack development, so.. I built this website to explore it
main.bio: Back when I graduated, I realized I didn't feel confident with modern web technologies, so I decided to play around with some of the free resources available on AWS. Ended up being useful as my online resume so here we are! I've been primarily a developer using C++ and C# but I am looking for opportunities to develop my career towards either modern back-end development or product management roles. Please reach out if you'd like to have a chat!

work.title: Technical Analyst
work.description: Currently working as a software developer for Teck Coal, developing and providing support for an array of Drilling and Blasting applications using C# .NET and C++.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Worked as a junior developer on application level C++ software for embedded GPS/communication devices. Also gained experience with CI/CD via Jenkins and automated GoogleTest/Python tests.

work.title: Interactive Web Developer
work.description: Worked with teachers, gathering requirements to develop learning tools/javascript web-apps to aid their respective online Moodle courses.

work.title: Junior Java Developer
work.description: Worked on the portal team as a summer student, relevant technologies - Java/SAP UI5.
